definition: the Ch'ing or Qing dynasty (1644-1911)
Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
General history of the Qing dynasty, compiled under Xiao Yishan 蕭一山

sentences.english: Compared with the Ming dynasty, the system of selecting officials in Qing dynasty had a big change.
sentences.chinese: 比之明代，清代的選官制度有了較大改變。

sentences.english: The Qing Dynasty is the Anhui local chronicle development prosperous time.
sentences.chinese: 清代是安徽方誌發展的鼎盛時期。

sentences.english: Li Yu and Aina Jushi is the best writer In the short vernacular fiction novel writing In the Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 李漁和艾衲居士是清代最出色的短篇白話小說作家。

sentences.english: The Qing dynasty vases had been displayed on the window sill for years.
sentences.chinese: 這些清代花瓶已經在展臺上展出了很長時間。

sentences.english: The textology of the Qing Dynasty is an old subject in the academic circle.
sentences.chinese: 清代考據學是學術界多次探討的老問題。

sentences.english: Li Xian-qiao was a representative writer of GaoMi Poetic School in Qin Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 李憲喬是清代高密詩派的代表性作家。

sentences.english: Philology prevailed very much in Qing Dynasty and especially many top-ranking scholars ever studied it at that time.
sentences.chinese: 清代小學極其昌盛，第一流的學者對小學均多所研究。

sentences.english: Nasonlanbo was a very famous poetess in the history of Mongolian literature in Qing dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 那遜蘭保是清代蒙古族文學史上著名的女詩人。

sentences.english: Wood inkstone began to research, but not when, in qing dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 木硯研究始於何時，沒有定論，但以清代居多。

sentences.english: The earliest notations for Chinese opera date from the Qing period.
sentences.chinese: 最早的中國戲曲樂譜出現於清代。

sentences.english: Yilin Gaicuo(Correction on the Errors of Medical Works)is a work of WANG Qing-ren in Qing dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 《醫林改錯》是清代醫家王清任的著作。

sentences.english: The QING Dynasty was the era of literature renaissance in Heluo Area.
sentences.chinese: 清代爲河洛地區文學的復興時期。

sentences.english: In the Qing dynasty, creation of women's poetry in Huizhou flourished.
sentences.chinese: 在清代，徽州女性詩詞創作出現了較爲繁榮的局面。

sentences.english: At the same time, salt smuggling was very serious.
sentences.chinese: 清代四川是重要的產鹽區，其私鹽問題十分突出。

sentences.english: Sup Sam Hung in Guangzhou is a licensed foreign trade organization with special authority from the Qing government.
sentences.chinese: 清代廣州十三行是政府特許的外貿壟斷組織。

sentences.english: Chapter 5 is about the regional distribution of Juren in shandong in Qing dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 第五章清代山東舉人的區域分佈研究。

definition: the Ming dynasty (1368-1644)
the final years of the Ch'ing or Qing dynasty/China at the turn of the 20th century
the late Qing and early Republic, i.e. China around 1911
the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
late Ming and early Qing/around the middle of the 17th century
Ch'ing or Qing dynasty (1644-1911)
late Ming/first half of the 17th century
the Ming (1368-1644) and Qing (1644-1911) dynasties
the early Ming (i.e. from second half of 14th century)
Republic of China (1912-1949)/used in Taiwan as the name of the calendar era (e.g. 民國六十年|民国六十年 is 1971, the 60th year after 1911)
Song dynasty (960-1279)
early years
reign name of penultimate Qing emperor Guangxu or Guang-hsu (1875-1908)
the late Qing/late 19th and early 20th century China
Jin Dynasty (1115-1234), founded by the Jurchen 女真[Nu:3 zhen1] people of North China, a precursor of the Mongol Yuan Dynasty
reign name (1909-1911) of the last Qing emperor Pu Yi 溥儀|溥仪
